Text: But I like the eye patch?

Only difference between this one and the scene4all is the addition of the "AlanWake.exe" file. So if  you've already installed the scene4all crack, all that is needed is the "AlanWake.exe" file and you're all set. Eye patch gone. The_laser didn't need to upload the whole crack again.
